name: Women of Xal
description:
Follow Xjena as she begins her climb up the dangerous political ladder against other women eying the same, powerful position of Matriarch. Help those who need it immediately, or focus on the future and potentially help a wider range of people. The path is yours to walk.

FEATURES

  • 10 hour story with countless branching paths and ways to complete each individual day
  • 15 love interests
  • 12 full “Romance/Friend” routes
  • Romanceable characters interact with each other due to a system that allows and encourage polyamorous options.
  • 120 minute soundtrack with both niche and wholly original genres.
  • Over 50 CGs / Full Illustrations and Several Animations
  • 3 different endings with a mind-numbingly long list of ways to reach them
  • Your choices being referenced and rewarded/punished more times than you can count.
